mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_health (project_id) VALUES (#{projectId}) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
INSERT INTO project_flow_metrics (project_id) VALUES (#{projectId}) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
INSERT INTO project_dependency_risk (project_id) VALUES (#{projectId}) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
INSERT INTO team_capacity_analytics (team_id) VALUES (#{teamId}) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND completed_at >= now() - interval '7 days'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND completed_at >= now() - interval '30 days'
SELECT COALESCE( AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (completed_at - started_at)) / 86400), 0 ) FROM task WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND completed_at IS NOT NULL AND started_at IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE project_flow_metrics SET wip_count = #{wip}, throughput_7d = #{throughput7d}, throughput_30d = #{throughput30d}, avg_cycle_time_days = #{avgCycle}, updated_at = now() WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task_dependency td JOIN task t ON t.id = td.task_id WHERE t.project_id = #{projectId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task_dependency td JOIN task dep ON dep.id = td.depends_on_task_id JOIN task t ON t.id = td.task_id WHERE t.project_id = #{projectId} AND dep.status <> 'COMPLETED'
mapper.update: UPDATE project_dependency_risk SET total_dependencies = #{total}, blocked_dependency_count = #{blocked}, critical_path_length = #{criticalPath}, dependency_density = #{density}, risk_score = #{risk}, updated_at = now() WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task t JOIN project p ON p.id = t.project_id WHERE p.team_id = #{teamId} AND t.status <> 'COMPLETED'

SELECT COALESCE(AVG(task_count), 0) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM task_assignee ta JOIN task t ON t.id = ta.task_id JOIN project p ON p.id = t.project_id WHERE p.team_id = #{teamId} AND t.status <> 'COMPLETED' GROUP BY ta.user_id) s

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT ta.user_id, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM task_assignee ta JOIN task t ON t.id = ta.task_id JOIN project p ON p.id = t.project_id WHERE p.team_id = #{teamId} AND t.status <> 'COMPLETED' GROUP BY ta.user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > #{threshold} ) s

SELECT COALESCE( AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (completed_at - started_at)) / 86400), 0 ) FROM task t JOIN project p ON p.id = t.project_id WHERE p.team_id = #{teamId} AND completed_at IS NOT NULL AND started_at IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE team_capacity_analytics SET active_projects = #{activeProjects}, active_tasks = #{activeTasks}, avg_tasks_per_user = #{avgTasks}, overloaded_users = #{overloaded}, avg_completion_time_days = #{avgCompletion}, burnout_risk_score = #{burnout}, updated_at = now() WHERE team_id = #{teamId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND started_at IS NOT NULL AND completed_at IS NULL AND started_at < now() - interval '14 days'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND end_date < CURRENT_DATE AND status <> 'COMPLETED'
mapper.update: UPDATE project_health SET overdue_tasks = #{overdue}, blocked_tasks = #{blocked}, health_score = #{score}, risk_level = #{riskLevel}, updated_at = now() WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
